title: Awami League
summary: The Bangladesh Awami League (Bengali: বাংলাদেশ আওয়ামী লীগ, romanized: Bānglādēsh Awāmī Līg, lit. 'Bangladesh People's League'), often simply called the Awami League or AL,[5][6] is a social liberal political party in Bangladesh and one of the major political parties in Bangladesh, being the ruling party of Bangladesh since 2008.[7]
